ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, with juice
title: Frozen Fruit Cups
instructions: In a large bowl, stir together the sour cream, lemon juice, sugar and salt until blended. Fold in the pineapple, cherries, bananas and pecans. Pour into paper lined muffin tins. Freeze until set, then transfer to resealable freezer bags for storage.
